EmailTemplate.subject: Primary Enrichment Online Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
19th March 2015
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
The online registration will be available on Monday 23rd March from 9am until Friday 27th March 2pm​. Please download the document in the link below to see a list of Enrichment activities available and links to the registration forms included:
Go to the following website for the Primary Enrichment Activities Lists & Online Registration Forms: http://www.britishschool.edu.my/media/731401/programme_information.pdf
Visit for the following website for Years 1 & 2 ​ : http://tinyurl.com/n5ymopz
Visit for the following website for Years 3 & 4​ : http://tinyurl.com/mu26lkh
Visit for the following website for Years 5 & 6 : http://tinyurl.com/nzk2ttt
Kind regards
Admin Team
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} World Class Education
